mapper.insert: insert into t_transfer(uid, money, consum_type,create_time,comment,balance) values(#{uid}, #{money}, #{consumType}, now(),#{comment},#{balance})
mapper.select:
select create_time, case when money>0 then money end income, case when money<0 then ABS(money) end output, balance, `comment` from t_transfer
DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and uid=#{uid}
